name: Providing Residents with Cell Phone Coverage
overview:
Your company is figuring out where to build cell towers to provide coverage to local residents. How many cell towers should they build and where? 

Details:

  1. Each unit on the grid represents 1 mile
  2. Houses within 4 miles of each cell tower can receive good cell coverage

PREDICTION.solutionPromptHelper: Click a coordinate to place a cell tower.

FIRST_PROPOSAL.instructions: As a next step, review some of the skills that might help you improve on your initial proposal. When you're ready, submit your first proposal (you can still edit later).

MODIFY_PROPOSAL.instructions: Your peers and members of the community have also submitted proposals. Review them and provide feedback. They might also give you ideas for how to improve your own proposal.

FINAL_SOLUTION.instructions: Proposal submitted! You can still provide feedback to your peers.
